subject: Interview Invitation - Google Software Engineering Intern
body_text:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in the Software Engineering Intern role at Google!

I'm excited to invite you to a technical phone interview. The interview will be 45 minutes and will focus on coding and problem-solving.

Please use this link to schedule your interview: https://calendar.google.com/schedule/abc123

Available slots:
- January 8, 2025
- January 10, 2025
- January 12, 2025

Please confirm your availability within 3 business days.

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
Google University Recruiting
body_html:
Hi,

I'm excited to invite you to a technical phone interview for the Software Engineering Intern role at Google.

Available slots: January 8, 10, or 12, 2025
